meanings.definition: To have sexual intercourse with someone.
meanings.sent1: They were swiving in the bedroom.
meanings.sent2: Couples often enjoy swiving in private.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors giggled when they heard the loud swiving next door.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like a dance, swiving together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted passionate swiving scenes.
